code: import*as Actions from'./actions';import initialState from'../store/initialState';export const PostsReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState.posts;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case Actions.ADD_POST:return{...state,list:action.payload};case Actions.FETCH_POST:return{...state,list:action.payload};case Actions.DELETE_POST:return{...state,list:action.payload};default:return state;}};
